description: This easy pasta recipe will have dinner on the table in 25 minutes. Curly fettuccine is tossed through sriracha, pecorino and garlic butter.
name: Garlic & Sriracha Fettuccine Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook pasta in a large saucepan of boiling water according to packet instructions. Drain, reserving 1 cup cooking liquid.
Combine sriracha, reserved cooking liquid and half of the pecorino in a medium bowl.
Meanwhile, melt butter in a large saucepan over low heat. Add garlic and cook for 2 minutes, stirring, or until garlic starts to colour.

Add pasta and sriracha mixture to pan. Cook for 3 minutes, stirring, or until pasta is warmed through and sauce has thickened. Divide pasta among bowls. Serve topped with remaining pecorino and parsley, and seasoned with pepper.
